author: Rotten Tomatoes Trailers
description:
Hayley Atwell, Simon Pegg, Pom Klementieff, Greg Tarzan Davis, Esai Morales, Angela Bassett, Hannah Waddingham, and director Christopher McQuarrie sat down with RT’s Nikki Novak to talk about their upcoming movie ‘Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning’. The cast shared the emotional last day on set, what it was like working with Tom, what it was like watching Tom do his stunts, and so much more. See ‘Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning’ in theaters May 23. Get tickets now!

► Buy Tickets for Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning: https://www.fandango.com/mission-impossible-the-final-reckoning-2025-238655/movie-overview?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc

The inventive yet overlooked son of Chief Stoick the Vast (Gerard Butler, reprising his voice role from the animated franchise), Hiccup defies centuries of tradition when he befriends Toothless, a feared Night Fury dragon.
